system.description: The Tau Drone Handler has trained to coordinate their drones' fire with exceptional speed and precision, allowing them to direct attacks in rapid succession.
system.benefit: Once per round as a Half Action or Reaction, Character can have one Drone under their Command immiedately make an Attack Action against any foe within range as a Free Action.

prerequisites.text: Tau Drone Handler Alternative Advance, 300xp. Perception 35+, Quick Draw

system.notes: Requires Tau Drone Handler Alternative Advance

specialAbilities.name: Drone Command Fire
specialAbilities.description: Once per round as a Half Action or Reaction, have one Drone under your command immediately make an Attack Action as a Free Action.
